demographics.role: Chairman of the pop-up committee, member of various committees
demographics.experience_level: Joined newcomers in March 2023, relatively new member
demographics.technical_proficiency: Low; does not have strong opinions about technology

background_context.situation: Involved in a social newcomer organization, uses the website primarily for event information
background_context.environment: Interacts primarily online; works Monday through Friday, 8 to 5
background_context.constraints: Limited to evenings and weekends for events

goals_motivations.drives: Seeking social engagement and participation in community events
goals_motivations.achievements: Wants to quickly find and sign up for events that fit into her schedule

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Uses the website mainly to look for events and sign up for them
behaviors_patterns.habits: Prefers to view events by date and returns to the same calendar view after checking details

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Frustrated by having to scroll back to previous calendar dates and the switching between list view and calendar view
pain_points_frustrations.does_not_work_well: Navigating back to the calendar after viewing an event is cumbersome

needs_desires.life_better: A more efficient way to navigate back to the calendar and maintain the view she was using
needs_desires.looking_for: Clearer navigation and improved usability of the website

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Functional use of the website is more important than aesthetics
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Values simplicity and efficiency in web navigation

technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Limited comfort with technology; finds some tools complicated

quotes: I think it's very good. I don't know how it can be improved, but yeah, it seems to be, it gets the job done.
It goes back to the beginning of like many months ago.
If I know if it's a Saturday or Monday through Friday at 10am when I can't do it kind of thing.
